      • setType

        public CdromTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setType(CdromTypes.HostBusAdapterType type)
        Type of host bus adapter to which the device should be attached. If null, guest-specific default values will be used
        Parameters:
        type - New value for the property.

      • setIde

        public CdromTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setIde(IdeAddressSpec ide)
        Address for attaching the device to a virtual IDE adapter. If null, the server will choose an available address; if none is available, the request will fail.
        Parameters:
        ide - New value for the property.

      • setSata

        public CdromTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setSata(SataAddressSpec sata)
        Address for attaching the device to a virtual SATA adapter. If null, the server will choose an available address; if none is available, the request will fail.
        Parameters:
        sata - New value for the property.

      • setBacking

        public CdromTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setBacking(CdromTypes.BackingSpec backing)
        Physical resource backing for the virtual CD-ROM device. If null, defaults to automatic detection of a suitable host device.
        Parameters:
        backing - New value for the property.

      • setStartConnected

        public CdromTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setStartConnected(java.lang.Boolean startConnected)
        Flag indicating whether the virtual device should be connected whenever the virtual machine is powered on. Defaults to false if null.
        Parameters:
        startConnected - New value for the property.

      • setAllowGuestControl

        public CdromTypes.CreateSpec.Builder setAllowGuestControl(java.lang.Boolean allowGuestControl)
        Flag indicating whether the guest can connect and disconnect the device. Defaults to false if null.
        Parameters:
        allowGuestControl - New value for the property.
